DataElementConcept.preferredName: Committee Or Monitoring Regulation Management Authority Professional Organization or Group Effective Date and Time Range
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A group delegated to consider some matter; a self-constituted organization to promote something.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done.:The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.:A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.:A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession._Existing in fact and ready for service.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: A group delegated to consider matters concerning clinical studies or trials.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).
A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done.
The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.
A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.
A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession.
